history.proof: intros x y Hx Hxy. apply Z.le_0_sub. sauto q: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x y Hx Hxy. apply Z.le_0_sub. apply Z.le_trans with (Z.mul x y). - apply Z.le_trans with 0. + apply Z.mul_nonpos_nonneg; auto. + apply Z.le_0_1. - auto.
